name: Better Together (Lj V. Miranda)
description:
Reach the top of the tower in this roguelike adventure...
Getting there isn't easy, so recruit your foes and turn them into allies.
As you gain friends, your party gets better, together!

This game is a submission to the MinnHax Game Jam 2022 with the theme, Getting Better.

Controls
  • Move: WASD / Arrow Keys
Credits

Development of this game won't be possible without the asset packs from the following creators:  

  • Music and audio: Subspace Audio
  • Art assets: pimen,  ansimuz, and 0x72
  • Color palette: vinik24
